description: A heavy mattress-like armor of cloth, leather and thick linings of Kevlar, originally used as protection in bullfighting.  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral and croupiere made from biosilicified chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.
A makeshift assembly of criniere, peytral and croupiere made from chitin fitted to a thin mesh.  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.
Protecteth yon hund fram ful daemons!  A heavy covering of chainmail, suitably made for small quadrupeds as protection.  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.
//: Description is reference to Churl scenario text - 'protect your dog from foul undead'.

name.str: boiled leather small quadruped barding with caprison
name.str_pl: boiled leather small quadruped bardings with caprison

description: A full barding for small quadrupeds consisting of boiled leather and cloth undercovering.  This caparison is depicting a battle between a monstrous dragon and regal griffin.  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.

name.str: boiled leather small quadruped barding with bones
name.str_pl: boiled leather small quadruped bardings with bones

description: Decorative bones affixed to leather small quadruped barding to invoke fear in bandits and raiders and traders all!  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.
A thin plastic covering adapted for small quadrupeds to protect from acid rain and other caustic sources.  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.

A thin mesh interwoven with superalloy plates and pouches for military working small quadrupeds that covers from the dewlap to the croup, down to the elbows.  You could put this on a friendly small quadruped.

name.str: pair of saddle bags for small quadruped
name.str_pl: pairs of saddle bags for small quadruped

description: A pair of covered pouches laid across the back of a small quadruped.
